title.text: A Simple Ensemble Method for Hedge Identification

abstractContent.text: We present in this paper a simple hedge identification method and its application on biomedical text.
The problem at hand is a subtask of CoNLL-2010 shared task.
Our solution consists of two classifiers, a statistical one and a CRF model, and a simple combination schema that combines their predictions.
We report in detail on each component of our system and discuss the results.
We also show that a more sophisticated combination schema could improve the F-score significantly.
